meanings.sent1: The shampooers at the salon are always busy washing customers' hair.
meanings.sent2: The hotel hired professional shampooers to clean the carpets.
meanings.sent3: The shampooers had a bubbly competition to see who could lather the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The team of shampooers worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The shampooers' expertise in cleaning hair made them highly sought after in the industry.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for shampooing
meanings.sent1: The new shampooers in the car wash are very efficient at cleaning vehicles.
meanings.sent2: The industrial shampooers in the laundry room can handle large loads of clothes.
meanings.sent3: The malfunctioning shampooers sprayed water everywhere, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The futuristic shampooers resembled something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent5: The powerful shampooers left the carpets looking brand new.
